mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diary(diaryno, title, ddate, summary, weather_code, emno, memberno, illustno) VALUES(diary_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{ddate}, #{summary}, #{weather_code}, #{emno}, #{memberno}, #{illustno})
mapper.select: SELECT diaryno, title, ddate, summary, weather_code, emno, illustno FROM diary ORDER BY diaryno DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM diary WHERE diaryno = #{diaryno}

SELECT * FROM diary WHERE title LIKE #{title}
AND TRUNC(ddate) >= TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TRUNC(ddate) <= TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY ddate DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( SELECT * FROM diary WHERE 1=1
AND title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
AND TRUNC(ddate) >= TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TRUNC(ddate) <= TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY ddate DESC, diaryno DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endNum} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startNum}
